1.QUESTION: How does the land purchase process work?
1.ANSWER: After choosing a property, you sign a reservation agreement, pay a deposit, and complete legal verification with our help. The full payment and transfer of ownership are done through a notary.

2.QUESTION: Can foreigners buy land in this country?
2.ANSWER: Yes, foreign citizens can legally purchase land under specific conditions, and our legal team will guide you through every step.

3.QUESTION: Are there any extra fees besides the land price?
3.ANSWER: Yes, expect legal, notary, registration, and administrative fees. We provide a full cost breakdown before you commit.

4.QUESTION: Can I buy land remotely?
4.ANSWER: Yes, we offer full remote services, including video tours, document handling, and signing through power of attorney.

1.QUESTION: What is Landvesto and how does it help me?
1.ANSWER: Landvesto is a digital platform connecting land buyers and sellers. It simplifies the process with verified listings, legal support, and personalized assistance.

2.QUESTION: Do I need a designer or architect to use Landvesto?
2.ANSWER: No, Landvesto is for land sales. If you plan to build, we can recommend certified architects after the purchase.

3.QUESTION: What types of land are available?
3.ANSWER: We offer agricultural, residential, and commercial land in urban and rural areas, with full legal clarity.

4.QUESTION: Can I get help with financing?
4.ANSWER: Yes, we collaborate with financial institutions and can connect you with mortgage or investment options.

1.QUESTION: How can I contact customer support?
1.ANSWER: You can reach us via live chat or email. Our team is available 7 days a week.

2.QUESTION: What should I do if I have technical issues?
2.ANSWER: Please report any technical problems through the support section. Our team will respond promptly.

3.QUESTION: How do I update my personal information?
3.ANSWER: Log into your account, go to profile settings, and make the necessary changes. Contact us if you need help.

4.QUESTION: Is there support for non-English speakers?
4.ANSWER: Yes, our team speaks multiple languages and we offer translated documents on request.

CONTACT.TITLE: Have a question ? Get in touch!
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: A great plateform to buy, sell and rent your lands without any agent or commisions.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.INTRO: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal data is handled safely and responsibly.
PRIVACY.INFORMATION_TEXT:
We collect the following types of information:

a. Personal Information - Name, email address, phone number, nationality, ID documents (optional), payment details (limited).

b. Land and Listing Information - Property descriptions, locations, documents, photos, and prices.

c. Usage Data - IP, browser, session activity.

d. Communication Data - Messages and inquiries.
PRIVACY.USAGE_TEXT: To provide and manage the platform, enable communication, process commissions, verify listings, improve services, and comply with laws.
PRIVACY.LEGAL_BASIS_TEXT: Your data is processed based on consent, contract performance, legal obligations, or legitimate interest.
PRIVACY.SHARING_TEXT: We may share data with payment processors, legal service providers, third-party tools, and authorities if required by law.
PRIVACY.RETENTION_TEXT: We retain data as needed for service delivery, legal compliance, dispute resolution, and account management.
PRIVACY.SECURITY_TEXT: We use appropriate measures to protect your data, but no internet transmission is 100% secure.
PRIVACY.INTERNATIONAL_TEXT: Your data may be processed in other countries. We apply safeguards for these transfers.
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_TEXT: You have the right to access, correct, delete, restrict processing, withdraw consent, and file complaints.
PRIVACY.COOKIES_TEXT: We use cookies to store preferences, track usage, and enable functionality. You can control cookies via your browser.
PRIVACY.CHILDREN_TEXT: Our services are not intended for users under 18. We do not knowingly collect data from minors.
PRIVACY.CHANGES_TEXT: We may update this policy periodically. Updates will appear here with a new effective date.
PRIVACY.CONTACT_TEXT: For questions, contact us at contact@landvesto.com.

TERMS.TITLE: Terms of Service
TERMS.INTRO:
Welcome to Landvesto, a platform that connects land sellers with buyers around the world. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of our website, mobile application, and all related services.
By using our platform, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms.
TERMS.ACCOUNTS_TEXT:
You must be at least 18 years old to create an account.
You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
TERMS.SERVICES_TEXT:
Landvesto provides a digital platform where landowners can list land for sale and potential buyers can browse and contact sellers.
We do not act as a real estate agent, broker, or legal intermediary. Landvesto does not participate in the actual transfer of property ownership.
Any land sale is a private agreement between buyer and seller, often involving third-party legal or notary services.
TERMS.FEES_TEXT:
The use of Landvesto is free for buyers.
Sellers agree to pay a 3% commission on the final sale price of any property sold through the platform.
Commission is payable after the sale is concluded, and failure to pay may result in suspension of your account, legal recovery action, or listing restrictions.
We may provide invoices and reminders electronically.
TERMS.USER_OBLIGATIONS_TEXT:
Users agree not to:
- Post false, misleading, or fraudulent land listings
- Upload illegal content or violate intellectual property rights
- Harass or abuse other users
- Use the platform for unauthorized commercial purposes

Landvesto reserves the right to remove any content or terminate access for violations without prior notice.
TERMS.LISTINGS_TEXT:
Sellers must provide accurate and truthful information about land they list for sale, including ownership documents, location, price, and legal status.
We may offer optional listing verification but do not guarantee the accuracy of any listing.
Landvesto is not responsible for verifying land ownership, legal documents, or land boundaries.
TERMS.INTELLECTUAL_TEXT:
All content on the platform, including text, images, logos, and software, is owned by Landvesto or its licensors.
You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our written permission.
You retain ownership of content you submit, but grant us a non-exclusive license to display, use, and promote it.
TERMS.TERMINATION_TEXT:
We may suspend or terminate your account and access to our services at any time if you violate these Terms, submit false information, or misuse the platform.
You may delete your account at any time by contacting our support team.
Upon termination, any obligations to pay outstanding commissions remain valid.
TERMS.LIABILITY_TEXT:
Landvesto is not liable for:
- Losses from transactions between buyers and sellers
- Inaccuracies in land listings
- Any legal disputes between parties
- Technical errors, outages, or unauthorized access
Use of the platform is at your own risk. We provide the platform 'as is' without warranties of any kind.
TERMS.PRIVACY_TEXT:
Our Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
By using the platform, you agree to our data practices.
We take reasonable steps to secure your data, but no system is fully immune to risks.
TERMS.CHANGES_TEXT:
We may update these Terms from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.
Your continued use of the platform after changes means you accept the revised Terms.
TERMS.CONTACT_TEXT: If you have questions or concerns regarding these Terms, please contact us at: contact@landvesto.com

GDPR.TITLE: Consent regarding the processing of your personal data
GDPR.LINE_1: We inform you that, starting from May 25, 2018, the provisions of Regulation (EU) No. 679/2016 of the European Parliament and the Council, regarding the protection of individuals with regard to the processing of personal data and the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation), are applicable.
GDPR.LINE_2: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation, you must express your consent regarding the processing of your personal data provided for the purpose of accessing or receiving services offered by SC TULOCO SRL through the Landvesto platform.
GDPR.LINE_3: The PURPOSE of processing personal data results from the signed service contract and, therefore, the data will be processed solely for contractual and legal purposes. Processing personal data facilitates the performance of activities related to the contract and/or legal obligations.
GDPR.LINE_4: The RIGHTS provided by the new regulation are the following:
GDPR.LINE_5: 1. The right of access is the right to obtain confirmation from us as to whether or not we process your data, and if so, to access that data and information about how it is processed.
GDPR.LINE_6: 2. The right to data portability means you can receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used, machine-readable format, and have the right to transmit those data to another controller.
GDPR.LINE_7: 3. The right to object refers to the right to oppose the processing of personal data when it serves a public or legitimate interest.
GDPR.LINE_8: 4. The right to rectification refers to correcting inaccurate personal data without undue delay.
GDPR.LINE_9: 5. The right to erasure / the right to be forgotten refers to the right to have your collected data deleted without undue delay in any of the following situations: the data is no longer needed for the purposes for which it was collected, you have withdrawn your consent, there is no other legal basis for processing, you object to the processing, or the data must be deleted to comply with a legal obligation.
GDPR.LINE_10: 6. The right to restrict processing is the right to obtain restriction of processing of your personal data by the data controller.
GDPR.LINE_11: If you refuse to give your consent for the processing of your personal data, you will not be able to benefit from the services provided through the Landvesto platform (including subscription-based services).
